verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> in my <S%H7879>prayer:<s%> <S%H5341>preserve<s%> my <S%H2416>life<s%> from <S%H4480>fear<s%> <S%H6343><s%> of the <S%H341>enemy.<s%>

Hide <S%H5641><s%> me from the secret <S%H4480>counsel<s%> <S%H5475><s%> of the <S%H7489>wicked;<s%> from the <S%H4480>insurrection<s%> <S%H7285><s%> of the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of iniquity: <S%H205><s%>

Who <S%H834><s%> <S%H8150>whet<s%> their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> like a <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H1869>bend<s%> their bows to shoot their <S%H2671>arrows,<s%> even <S%H4751>bitter<s%> words: <S%H1697><s%>
That they may <S%H3384>shoot<s%> in <S%H4565>secret<s%> at the <S%H8535>perfect:<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> do they <S%H3384>shoot<s%> at him, and <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3808>not.<s%>

They <S%H2388>encourage<s%> themselves in an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1697>matter:<s%> they <S%H5608>commune<s%> of laying snares <S%H2934>privily;<s%> <S%H4170><s%> they <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> them?

They search <S%H2664>out<s%> <S%H5766>iniquities;<s%> they <S%H8552>accomplish<s%> a diligent <S%H2665>search:<s%> <S%H2664><s%> both the <S%H7130>inward<s%> thought of every <S%H376>one<s%> of them, and the <S%H3820>heart,<s%> is <S%H6013>deep.<s%>
But <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H3384>shoot<s%> at them with an <S%H2671>arrow;<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> shall they <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H4347>wounded.<s%>
So they shall make their own <S%H3956>tongue<s%> to <S%H3782>fall<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> themselves: <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H7200>see<s%> them shall flee <S%H5074>away.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> shall <S%H3372>fear,<s%> and shall <S%H5046>declare<s%> the <S%H6467>work<s%> of <S%H430>God;<s%> for they shall wisely <S%H7919>consider<s%> of his <S%H4639>doing.<s%>

The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and shall <S%H2620>trust<s%> in him; and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3477>upright<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall <S%H1984>glory.<s%>
